title: Why do i get punished, when its the other person who started it?
body:
I got chat banned with reason (not saying anything wrong with this) but in the game in question, the only reason i started abusing him is because he was a troll, if they're gonna troll they deserve to be abused.

Also if i got a ban, but he didn't you guys need to fix your banning system

Because its obviously not working

replies.body:
Goes by the age old adage "two wrongs don't make a right". If he breaks the rules he will be punished just as you have been for doing the same. 

No reports means no punishment, so always be sure to report negative players in post game. A single valid report can trigger a punishment, so choosing not to report a negative player for any reason is only doing yourself a disservice.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=JpjU8K9a,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-20T13:29:54.686+0000)
>
> Goes by the age old adage "two wrongs don't make a right". If he breaks the rules he will be punished just as you have been for doing the same. 
> 
> No reports means no punishment, so always be sure to report negative players in post game. A single valid report can trigger a punishment, so choosing not to report a negative player for any reason is only doing yourself a disservice.

But the saying also goes eye for an eye, so if he's gonna rage and troll me, then i can do the same if we're going by sayings, and the only reason i abused the fuck out of him is because he literally started the game, by quoting my most recent game and adding 'this guys a shit%%%%, don't want him as supp or adc'
But that scenario doesn't make the act of taking an eye ok and therefore is punishable. Since you both did it, you will both face punishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=JpjU8K9a,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-12-21T09:36:01.117+0000)
>
> But that scenario doesn't make the act of taking an eye ok and therefore is punishable. Since you both did it, you will both face punishment.

100% sure he didn't get punished, becuase i played another game with him afterwards and he was just as toxic, no chat ban nothing

> Why do i get punished, when its the other person who started it?

Because someone else doing the wrong thing doesn't exempt you from the rules.

> if they're gonna troll they deserve to be abused.

No, they deserve to be banned. Two completely different results.
two wrongs don't make a right.

Someone steals something of yours, out of revenge you decide to kill him. Just because he stole something of yours doesn't justify you murdering him. 

The same goes with this example (except a lot less extreme lol), him trolling doesn't justify you swearing/being abusive. Seriously, this is the kind of stuff they teach in Grade 1 and Kindy. Like BarryButcher said, just grow up.
